data.description: Output values from perl built-in constructs
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module presents the new way to think perl programming process.
    It gives a way to make code more "recursive" and makes it clearlier
    and more straightforward because a programmer can use output values
    from while, foreach and if-elsif-else constructs.

    I'm not sure about the namespace because Pause told me that this
    might not be a clever choose.
